FuncDef:
The load-balance hash-mode command configures the hash algorithm for load balancing on an Eth-Trunk interface.
The undo load-balance hash-mode command restores the default hash algorithm for load balancing on an Eth-Trunk interface. The load-balance hash-mode command configures the hash algorithm for load balancing on an Eth-Trunk interface. The undo load-balance hash-mode command restores the default hash algorithm for load balancing on an Eth-Trunk interface. By default, the hash algorithm value for load balancing on an Eth-Trunk interface is 1. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
The value of hash mode.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 9. The default value is 1.
